content:
Though I've traveled far and wide,
This is my first time facing such turbulent chaos
head-on.

Thankfully, all of Qianfeng's cars are pretty sturdy,
and Sani's driving skills are top-notch.
Otherwise, we might have had to turn back.

Sani's really steady behind the wheel.
Me? I can drive, but...
Just don't make me look at the numbers on the dashboard, or I'll get carsick.
